title: Units
content:
## Types of Units

> - rem
- em
- px
- vw



## EM
* Default to 16px
* Size is compounding
* Relative to Font Size
* Relative to Parent Element


## REM
* Default to 16px
* Relative to Root Element (html element)


https://smazee.com/blog/css-units-px-em-rem-vh-vw-vmin-vmax

![](image-kx4fb2yd.png)


## PX
* Pixels are Pixels
* Relative to Nothing
